doc:
Ray Combs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Combs 0 Raymond Neil Combs, Jr. (April 3, 1956 – June 2, 1996) was an American stand-up comedian, actor, and game show host. Combs began his professional career in the late 1970s. His popularity on the stand-up circuit led to him being signed as the host of the revival of the game show Family Feud. The show aired on CBS and was in syndication until 1994. From 1995 to 1996, Combs hosted another game show, Family Challenge. Combs committed suicide by hanging himself at the Glendale Adventist Medical Center, where he was being held for observation on June 2, 1996. Raymond_Neil_Combs , Jr. ( April_3_,_1956 – June_2_,_1996 ) was an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , and game show host . Combs began his_professional_career in the_late_1970s . His_popularity on the_stand-up_circuit led to him being_signed as the_host of the_revival of the_game_show_Family_Feud . The_show aired on CBS and was in syndication until 1994 . From 1995 to 1996 , Combs hosted another_game_show , Family_Challenge . Combs committed suicide by hanging himself at the_Glendale_Adventist_Medical_Center , where he was_being_held for observation on June_2_,_1996 .
